dct_title_s: Map showing automobile roads from Los Angeles to Sunland, La Crescenta, & La Canada
dct_description_sm: Automobile Club of Southern California ; A.J.B.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Oriented with north toward upper left.
Shows city plans, roads, railroads, waterways, farmland.
Numbered 331 in lower right corner and 8 in right margin.
Belongs to a series of strip maps showing roads in California.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
